name: Gundemonium Recollection
description: First of the three titles in the Gundemonium Collection, this pixel-style side-scroller brings the intensity of the 'bullet hell' shooter genre to Steam. Choose one of two playable characters, including an unlockable third character! Modify character weaponry to your liking!
minimum_requirements: Operating system: Windows速 XP, Vista, or Windows 7 Processor: Intel速 1 GHz Processor (Recommended: 2 GHz) Memory: 256 MB RAM (Recommended: 512 MB RAM) Hard disk space: 500MB Video: DirectX速 9 level Graphics Card Sound: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card DirectX速: DirectX 9 or above
